item.title: Hello Agency
item.description: It’s been one full week since I started my agency, but I think I’ve learned more this week than I do in five regular ones. I’d like to take some time to discuss what I’ve learned so far. git commit -m “New Agency, who dis?” When you start a business, it’s best to have a plan. But how well thought out should the plan be? Should it be shorter than a elevator pitch?
